47 BIT_VECTOR ExpandBitVector(BIT_VECTOR Vector, int NewNumBits) {
48  return ((BIT_VECTOR) Erealloc(Vector,
49  sizeof(Vector[0]) * WordsInVectorOfSize(NewNumBits)));
50 } /* ExpandBitVector */
